A sermon on the parable of the sower, taken out of the 13. of Mathew. Preached at London by M. G. Gifford, & published at the request of sundrie godly and well disposed persons Gifford, George, d. 1620.
[40] p.
[By T. East] for Tobie Cooke, dwelling at the Tigres head in Paules Churchyard, Imprinted at London : 1582.
Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A-B C⁴. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
